ModuleAnchor.helper: Used to create #anchor-links on the page (numbers, letters, hyphens only).

ID.helper: Only used for management & troubleshooting. Has no impact on your website.

Name.helper: Specifies a name for the meta data. (Intentionally excludes: description, keywords, and viewport) Those should be done in the theme and/or page settings.

Content.helper: Specifies the value associated with the name attribute.

LinkTags.helper: Building <link rel="" /> tags. (Attributes intentionally excluded: media, title, as, crossorigin, and integrity.)

ID.helper: Only used for editing and troubleshooting.

Rel.helper: Required. Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document. (Intentionally excluded: dns-prefetch, pingback, preconnect, prefetch, preload, prerender, and stylesheet.)

Href.helper: Specifies the location of the linked document. Can be a local or external URL.

Hreflang.helper: Specifies the language of the text in the linked document

Sizes.helper: Specifies the size of the linked resource. Only for rel="icon"
